authors.name: Bonnie Evans
authors.affiliation: MRC Laboratory of Medical Sciences; Imperial College London

before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3i17j","text":"Make up 30% glycerol in sterile water and autoclave.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

96160.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1s57n","text":"Autoclave or microwave LB agar from media room","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mf48","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ardg0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"80pbv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"key":"u4ti","text":"Contents of LB Agar:\n37 g pre-mixed powder consisting of:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2ok6b","text":"- 5 g peptone","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"h2hu","text":"- 10 g peptone from casein","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"92m9","text":"- 10 g sodium chloride","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ebdsq","text":"- 10 g g agar-agar","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7iqct","text":"1 L Sterile H2O","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"4DECF709DADF11EE92020A58A9FEAC02"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4h4mm","text":"Make up 15 mg/ml tetracycline hydrochloride in sterile water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"foacs","text":"Dilute tetracycline hydrochloride 1/1000 dilution in LB agar (final conc: 15 ug/mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7obrf","text":"Using a serological pipette, dispense 35 mL agar into 90 mm Petri dishes. Leave to set. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f42si","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74kcf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d5e6j","text":"In the fume hood, add tetracycline hydrochloride to the Eppendorf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"730rv","text":"Weigh the Eppendorf, and calculate the difference to determine the weight (mg) of compound","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6o79k","text":"To calculate sterile water (uL) to add =  (compound mg / 15 mg/mL) x 1000 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2bkgh","text":"Arraying Canadian MetaMicroBiome Library (Neufeld et al. 2011) clones into multi-well plates for screening. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":50,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"dhhaf","text":"Tetracycline hydrochloride (Sigma-Aldrich, T3383-25G)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ajaf","text":"ColiRollers Plating Beads (Novagen, 71013-3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j4jh","text":"384 Well Clear Flat Bottom Polystyrene Not Treated Microplate with Lid Sterile (Corning, 3680) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6k3uf","text":"Prepare tetracycline LB agar plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adbuc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jlsu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":96160,"title":"Making tetracycline LB agar plates","title_html":"Making tetracycline LB agar plates","load_collapsed":true,"uri":"making-tetracycline-lb-agar-plates-c958z89w","image":{"source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"Bonnie Evans","affiliation":"MRC Laboratory of Medical Sciences","affiliation_url":"","username":"bonnie-evans","link":"","image":{"source":"/img/avatars/013.png","placeholder":"/img/avatars/013.png","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":10},"type_id":1,"guid":"46D7AD60EEEA48C5A6FF3641B523C7E0"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8g4e","text":"Dilute 2 uL glycerol stock in 20 mL sterile PBS (1/10000 dilution). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3egbg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i8ik","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2htjk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"41g29","text":"Keep sample on ice and return to -80 °C before proceeding with next steps. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"FBC561A0CA6B4BC283116BD1A64A4F35"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f64mf","text":"Pipette 100 uL of diluted sample into centre of 90 mm agar plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehv2m","text":"Put 4-5 plating beads onto the agar. With lid on, move the plate back and forth so the beads spread the liquid evenly across the agar surface. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2uv1","text":"Place 70 uM cell strainer on another beaker to collect beads from liquid. Put beads back into the empty beaker. Dispose of water in waste bottle for treatment with Virkon.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tt65","text":"Add ethanol to beads. Repeat above step. Dispose of liquid in ethanol waste bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5j2en","text":"Wash beads with sterile water as above. Put beads in a bottle and send for autoclaving.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ak26","text":"Interlock door guard into slot on the inside of the instrument door Prepare growth media Pick colonies with the PIXL 4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d8smg","text":"On the Home Screen, select UV Lamp and run for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9d9cu","text":"Home Screen -\u003e Run Workfl ows -\u003e Random Colony Picking -\u003e Blank","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"est4d","text":"Select Source Plate: Petri dish -\u003e 90 mm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7g6em","text":"Capture settings -\u003e White Light -\u003e Select colonies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m3do","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfeac","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fhv19","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3so58","text":"PIXL will now analyse the image to detect colonies. You can manually select or deselect colonies, or change the algorithm to optimise detection.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"8106787DA326484C82FE45AADB18919B"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"akbd1","text":"Select Target Plate: SBS -\u003e 384","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bq81","text":"Check the Project Summary -\u003e Start Picking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc7vl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0ona","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8l5ff","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"39r3o","text":"Check the pick up line is touching the colony and then the LB media in the well to ensure proper inoculation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"277D47DBCE3A44409E210796BA8A1C2F"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79vsr","text":"To remove the beads, turn the plate so the beads collect in the side of the lid. Carefully open the lid and drop the beads into a glass beaker. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81d2t","text":"Incubate the inoculated plates at 37° for ~25.5hrs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk200","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8006","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9hcqf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"66c2b","text":"Individual white colonies. Large enough to be detected by the PIXL but not touching neighbouring colonies. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"10B2E63EA6774FA298B9D3165269A5E3"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ls4m","text":"Add sterile water to the glass beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7ome","text":"Before using the PIXL, sterilise the instrument with UV.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4iug","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dvdrt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"p4m2","text":"See attachment for PIXL colony picker (Sanger) user guide,","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"ED295DD0593A4CE5B90464CC41CFC44E"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8pqh","text":"Make up 15 mg/ml tetracycline hydrochloride in sterile water, and add 1/000 dilution to LB broth (fi nal conc. 15 ug/ml)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2c8m0","text":"Using the VIAFILL, dispense 50 uL of tetracycline LB per well into 384 well plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dhak","text":"Set up instrument via display screen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ttkj","text":"Incubate 384 well plates at 37 °C overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"87u11","text":"Measure OD600 of the overnight culture using a plate reader.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tmk1","text":"Using the VIAFILL, dispense 50 uL of 30% glycerol per well into 384 well plates (final conc: 15% glycerol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9cd4","text":"Incubate plate for 2 hours at 37 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fo7j","text":"Seal using aluminium seals and store at -80 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3pjld","text":"Clean plating beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Metagenomic library plates
